<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_486042_se_pjt_tr_projects</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_486042_se_pjt_tr_projects">sys_mod_countISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="sys_mod_count" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Project updates</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var gr = new GlideRecord("projects");
gr.addQuery("parent", current.sys_id);
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    gr.Updates = current.Project_updates.getJournalEntry(1);
    gr.update();
}
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>NB</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-28 06:29:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d636a8041b28d01023c27596cc4bcb11</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Project updates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SE Project Tracker" source="x_486042_se_pjt_tr">69444e861b10101023c27596cc4bcb20</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SE Project Tracker">69444e861b10101023c27596cc4bcb20</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d636a8041b28d01023c27596cc4bcb11</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-28 07:11:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d636a8041b28d01023c27596cc4bcb11"/></record_update>
